title: How to Use an 18% Gray Card

steps.headline: Get an 18% gray card.
Before taking photographs, take a shot of the gray card in the light conditions that you will be photographing in.
steps.description:

steps.headline: While processing the photos, go to the gray card photo first.
steps.description: Set your software to adjust exposure according to that gray card image.

steps.headline: Use those adjustments on all of the photographs taken in that session.
Remember to re-photograph the gray card if the lighting or location changes.
